title: kathy ireland HOME Brushed Steel Bowl Cap for Ceiling Fan Light Fixtures, 3-Pack
features: Metal ceiling fan light fixture bowl caps in Brushed Steel finish
1 finial pack includes no-hole, one-hole and two-hole options

description: This 3-pack of Metal Bowl Caps in Brushed Steel finish are a nice addition to any ceiling fan light kit; providing a stylish design upgrade to your favorite Emerson fans. 1 finial pack includes no-hole, one-hole and two-hole options, an essential component in completing a customized look for your ceiling fan light kit.
Three-pack metal bowls caps for use with Emerson LK7x and LK8x series light fixtures.
